links.*: The One Ring: The Lord of the Rings Role-playing Game

wikitext.*:
[[Image:Cubicle 7 Entertainment logo.jpg|Company logo|frame]]

'''Cubicle 7 Entertainment''' is a British-based publisher and events company, specialising in the games industry. Founded in [[2006]], by Angus Abranson and Dominic McDowall-Thomas, the company has published role-playing games from a list of licensed and home-grown properties. On [[20 January]] [[2010]], Cubicle announced the release of ''[[The One Ring: The Lord of the Rings Role-playing Game]]''. 

On [[27 July]] [[2016]], Cubicle announced the release of ''[[Adventures in Middle-earth]]''.<ref name=Announce>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://cubicle7.co.uk/ogl-omg-adventures-in-middle-earth-coming-soon/|articlename=OGL OMG - Adventures in Middle-earth coming soon|dated=27 July 2016|website=[http://cubicle7.co.uk/ cubicle7.co.uk]|accessed=27 July 2016}}</ref>

On [[27 November]] [[2019]], the company announced that, by the first half of [[2020]], they would cease publishing The One Ring and Adventures in Middle-earth.<ref name=TORE>[https://www.cubicle7games.com/unexpected-tor2-update Unexpected The One Ring 2 Update]</ref>
